author: jaz
msg: update contact list comm status now triggered using the parent comm event ID; auto marks bounced mails and triggers the invalidation of email addresses from list when a bounce happens.

author: jaz
msg: 1. Now use EntityListIterator for getting the list's contacts
2. Now always creates a Comm event for all sent mail
3. Associates the "template" comm event as the parent comm event for each email
